scripts.clean: rimraf dist bin test/coverage test/test-results.xml website docs/.vitepress/.temp docs/.vitepress/.cache
scripts.devbuild: rimraf 'dist/**/*.map';mkdirp dist/css;mkdirp dist/js;mkdirp dist/fonts;mkdirp dist/documentclasses;mkdirp dist/packages;touch dist/documentclasses/.keep;touch dist/packages/.keep;rsync -a src/css/ dist/css/;rsync -a src/fonts/ dist/fonts/;rsync -a node_modules/katex/dist/fonts/*.woff2 dist/fonts/;rsync -a src/js/ dist/js/;mkdirp bin;lsc -bc --no-header -m embedded -p src/cli.ls > bin/latex.js;chmod a+x bin/latex.js;rollup -c;
scripts.prepare-latex-assets: rimraf docs/public/latexjs; mkdirp docs/public/latexjs/css docs/public/latexjs/fonts docs/public/latexjs/js; rsync -a dist/css/ docs/public/latexjs/css/; rsync -a dist/fonts/ docs/public/latexjs/fonts/; rsync -a dist/js/ docs/public/latexjs/js/;
scripts.devdocs: npm run devbuild; npm run prepare-latex-assets; vitepress dev docs
scripts.docs: npm run build; npm run prepare-latex-assets; [ ! -d website ] && git worktree add website gh-pages; mv website/.git .website.git; vitepress build docs; mv .website.git website/.git; cd website; git add .; git commit -m 'regenerated website';
scripts.testc: nyc --include=bin --include=src --include=dist -e ls --reporter=html --reporter=text --reporter=lcovonly --report-dir=test/coverage             npx mocha -i -g screenshot --reporter mocha-junit-reporter --reporter-options mochaFile=./test/test-results.xml test/*.ls&&npx mocha -g screenshot --reporter mocha-junit-reporter --reporter-options mochaFile=./test/screenshots/test-results.xml test/*.ls;
